file_content.text: Why are you back here? Go away.
Please, just leave me alone.
Excuse me? What are you doing in my house? Is there no limit to your nerve--you barricade the town, you break into people's homes....
Are you insane? You're going to blow my husband's cover! Storming in here, in plain view--what are you thinking?
Bellis isn't even here--he left for some kind of meeting. Now get out of here before you raise suspicions!
I'm afraid your husband was killed by the separatists, ma'am.
I'm sorry. Bellis is dead.
Can you tell me where to find your husband's field box, ma'am?
I need a box Bellis left here.
Bellis's files and data--give them to me! Now!
Give me the field box!
Look, Bellis told me that no Republic people would come here for anything unless he was... he was....
Oh no. No, no, not Bellis! He can't be dead! No!
Bellis risked his life everyday for you, and now you've gone and gotten him killed! My poor, sweet Bellis....
I'm very sorry.
Bellis was a good man, and now he's dead because of some stupid war on a backwater planet no one cares about!
You should be very proud, ma'am. Your husband died serving the Republic.
Bellis was a hero.
What are you, a droid? He was my husband! I don't care about you or your stupid Republic--my husband is dead!
Please--a lot of innocent lives are on the line. We need your husband's field box.
We need your help, ma'am.
As soon as I have your husband's field box, ma'am, I'll leave you alone.
Please just give me the box.
If you don't hand over that box, I might decide you're working with the separatists.
You're really pushing me.
You can mope and complain later--I need the field box!
I don't have time for this!
Why should I give it to you? You got my husband killed--all of you, you killed him.
Bellis was loyal to the Republic, ma'am. He would want you to help us.
Your husband wanted to help.
What he wanted was to make a living and keep a roof over our heads. And you took advantage--you paid him to get himself killed!
The separatists murdered your husband, ma'am--not me.
I didn't kill Bellis!
Yes, because you made him spy on them. He'd be alive if not for you.
Your husband gave his life to bring us this information. If you don't help us now, his sacrifice will mean nothing.
Bellis died helping our cause.
You're being naive.
Don't feed me that garbage. You want the field box? Fine, it's over there. Take it! Take it and get out.
Your husband was a true hero, ma'am. You have my deepest condolences.
Again, I'm very sorry.
Please, just go. Oh, Bellis....
Hand over that field box right now, or I'll haul you in for treason.
That's it. I've had enough.
Either you give me the field box, or you join Bellis. It's your call.
You're about to be next.
What? You're serious. The field box is over there. Take it, just take it.
You're a monster.
Just doing my job.
This area isn't safe--separatists will probably be swarming this place any minute.
You should get out of here.
Like you care what happens to people like me. Oh, Bellis....
Now that you've put my entire mission in danger, I'll be glad to go.
You don't know the half of it.
Oh, Bellis....
Please, I haven't done anything wrong. I'm not with the separatists, soldier.
What are you doing here? I'm not looking for any trouble.
